name: succotash
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a vegetable dish that consists of cooked maize kernels (= seeds) and butter beans, mixed together : The chicken was moist and delicious, and the succotash was light. Mix the cooked kernels with cooked lima beans to make succotash.
More examplesFewer examplesServe the steaks with succotash and garnish with sprigs of thyme. I love corn on the cob but also in a succotash, where the combination with other vegetables adds flavor as well as variety.
